[ARG0: Peter Navarro , a trade adviser to President Donald Trump ,] escalated the White House 's rebuke of Canadian Prime Minister Justin Trudeau , [V: calling] [ARG1: him] [ARG2: weak and dishonest] [ARGM-TMP: on Sunday] .
